descriptionHtml:
Spectral Arrow is now avalible. 

For thoughs of you who dont know spectral arrow is aready in the game but not avalible. 

This mod makes it avalible you can now purchase it from Phinis Gestor in the Collage of Winterhold.

There has also been some changes to the power of it. 

It goes off of your Conjuration level and some Perks from Archery as a bonus. 
Perks that affect it from Acrchery are: Overcharge, Powershot, and Bullseye. 

Levels 1-24 
10 Damge 

Levels 25-49 
25 Damage 

Levels 50-74 
40 Damge 

Levels 75-99 
60 Damage 

Level 100 
90 Damage 

Bugs: 
Sometimes causes Game to Crash. 
When you have 1 Enemy left, you tend to get Cinematic Kill even when Enemy does not die. 

Hope everyone enjoys! 

If anyone can post a fix for the bug it would be helpful.
author: Sn00terz
